WORK_EXP_PAGE.NEOGEO_TITLE: Software Engineer – Neo Geo New Media GmbH
WORK_EXP_PAGE.NEOGEO_DESC: Contributed to large-scale enterprise projects for major clients such as Schmitz Cargobull AG. Worked closely with interdisciplinary teams in a Microsoft Gold Partner environment, focusing on scalable, robust solutions.
WORK_EXP_PAGE.FOCUS_DESC: Delivered consulting and software solutions for some of the largest Swiss banks, including CS Bank. Gained extensive experience collaborating across diverse teams in high-security, high-stakes environments.
